thread.section_title: Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Another wonderful saty
thread.title_full: Another wonderful saty - Review of Club Quarters Hotel, Trafalgar Square, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: C M
title: Another wonderful saty
text: I have stayed in Club Quarters hotels before and have always been impressed by their attention to detail and facilities but I simply love the location of this one. Just a few yards away from Trafalgar Square but in a lovely leafy quiet street - the best of both worlds! The staff are always very attentive and nothing is too much trouble but to be honest the hotel is so well equipped that you barely need to ask them for anything. Highly recommended
